attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Last year, China's AI landscape was dominated by a surge in foundation models, while now the focus has shifted towards the development of AI agents that are increasingly capable of performing complex tasks.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new taxonomy for next-generation reasoning models has been introduced, examining the evolution of reinforcement learning and variables recovery models (RLVR) to inform future advancements.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The MIT Technology Review's What’s Next series highlights the future implications of AI on mathematics and explores how organizations like DARPA view the interplay of these fields.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Gemini 2.5 has been launched with advanced features for audio dialogue generation, showcasing the growing capabilities of AI technology in multimedia applications.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A new report detailing the energy consumption and environmental impact of AI has been published, revealing the significant resources AI technologies demand.
